🚨🚨Communication 101🚨🚨

How can I stay up to date with the latest information and current events from my child’s teacher and the school?

1. Make sure teachers have current emails so you can get the weekly news letters etc. Teacher/ parent emails are the first line of communication. Don’t forget to check your email!

2. Check your students binders and or take home folders.

3. Check the school website calendars.

There are two of them: Academic Calendar has holidays, testing and report card dates.

Events Calendar has the school events. Sometimes date changes occur and can’t be helped so check continually for updates.

Athletics has its own tab and all sports schedules are posted there.

mycompassacademy.com

4. Subscribe to Teacher pages on our school website.

5. Subscribe to the remind 101 , Class Dojo etc from Teachers if they use it.

Please make sure to call the school and let us know if your student is going to be out sick and do not forget your doctors excuses.
Thank you and stay well!!
